sources.title: Best Restaurants in Torrance, Gardena, Manhattan Beach, Redondo, Carson & South Bay Los Angeles
sources.content: "Handmade is literally the namesake of this tiny but mighty Redondo Beach Italian spot with chef Marco Pacelli making big restaurant-level plates of pasta. First, pick a shape like pappardelle or spaghetti, then choose the sauce, such as carbonara, bolognese, or pomodoro. Though most of the food is optimized to take home, a few tables and counter seats make it possible to eat plates while they're still piping hot." - Matthew Kang

sources.title: Best Kid-Friendly Restaurants Los Angeles
sources.content: "Kids and pasta go together like peas and carrots. Here at Fatto a Mano, kids can customize their meals with a variety of sauces and seven house-extruded pastas including pappardelle, spaghetti, and linguini." - Cathy Chaplin, Eater Staff
